description:
Everything you need in a pair of hiking pants, plus a hidden superpower. The durable nylon is rated UPF 40+ to shield you from the sun when you’re trekking with minimal cover, and it dries quickly if you work up a sweat or splash through a creek. A convertible design lets you choose to wear pants or shorts.

  • Breathable polyester fabric with FlashDry-XD™ technology to keep you dry and cool
  • PFC-free DWR finish for added water repellency
  • Gusseted crotch adds mobility for high steps or leaps across streams
  • Integrated webbing waistbelt and drawcord at leg openings for a personalized fit
  • Zip-off legs let you convert to shorts with an 8in. inseam
  • Fabric provides UPF 40+ sun protection
name: The North Face Paramount Pro Convertible Pants - Men's
